title: r/Maliciouscompliance "Ma'am, You Can't Wear That Here" "OK!" *Strips*
description: r/Maliciouscompliance What happens when a sexist judge tells a lady lawyer that she can't wear pants in a courtroom? Malicious compliance, of course! The judge simply takes off her pants and treats her long coat as a makeshift dress. Be careful when you make demands of lawyers, because their whole job is malicious compliance! If you like this video, subscribe to my channel for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
